name: WPshed Theme Extras
author: Stefan I.

sections.description:
WPshed Theme Extras add powerful features to your WordPress Theme usually packed in “premium” themes, however, this features belongs to a Plugin so you don’t have to be locked-in for using a specific theme for any of these features.

Once the plugin is activated you’ll have the following features:

  • Portfolio – Custom Post Type
  • Testimonials – Custom Post Type
  • Slides – Custom Post Type
  • Portfolio – Widget
  • Testimonials – Widget
  • Slides – Widget
  • Featured Posts – Widget
  • Featured Page – Widget
  • User Profile – Widget
  • Services – Widget
  • Price Table – Widget
  • Hero – Widget
  • Image – Widget
  • Social Icons – Widget
  • Grid – Shortcode
  • Buttons – Shortcode
  • Content Box – Shortcode
  • Fade-up effects for Widgets
  • Local-scroll in-page navigation

The plugin is designed to work flawlessly with WPshed Themes, however, there is no limitation for using it with any other WordPress theme.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wpshed-theme-extras directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Theme Extras screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wpshed-theme-extras directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Theme Extras screen to configure the plugin

Can I use this Plugin in any Theme?

Yes, just make sure you have sidebar widget areas and you will be able to use any of the widgets.

How can I create a custom Portfolio template?

Create a file called archive-portfolio.php and single-portfolio.php for single portfolio post. Details on WordPress Codex
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Version bump.

1.1.0

  • Added the Custom Sidebar name to each section to make it easier to know which sidebars belongs to a section.

1.0.9

  • Added support for text align.

1.0.8

  • Added the option to set the Custom Sidebars defaults from the theme.

1.0.7

  • Added the option to enable Portfolio categories and Tags.

1.0.6

  • Fixed a bug where a section with the same ID could be generated.

1.0.5

  • Bug Fixes.

1.0.3

  • Added drag and drop custom sidebar builder.= 1.0.2 =
  • Added Call to Action Widget.

1.0.1

  • Added the possibility to set the thumbnail sizes for Portfolio, Slides and Testimonials.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: WTE add powerful features to your Theme. It is designed to work with WPshed Themes, but all featured can be used in any other theme.
